This analysis aim assess incidence longitudinal stent deformation PtCr stent large single centre all-comers population use quantitative angiographic analysis ( QCA ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Aims : Recent report describe case novel thin-strut coronary stent longitudinal deformation deployment biomechanical analysis suggest increased susceptibility complication platinum chromium ( PtCr ) coronary stent platform . The aim analysis ass incidence longitudinal stent deformation PtCr stent large single centre all-comers population . Methods : Quantitative angiographic analysis ( QCA ) PtCr stent deploy consecutive all-comers patient treat Laboratory January 2011 August 2012 perform independent core laboratory . In particular QCA : nominal stent lenght ratio calculate every PtCr stent . Clinical follow data overall cardiac mortality , myocardial infarction target vessel revascularization also perform .
